activities:
C&R Research Services, Inc. is a marketing research company.  C&R surveys gather opinions about products, advertising, and services of many kinds, and are used to guide the development of products and services, and their associated advertising, communication and marketing programs.  We collect three kinds of information: (1) opinions about issues of interest to us or our clients, (2) background household information, and (3) personally identifiable information about survey participants.  Some of this information may be collected by telephone or face-to-face contact, while other information is collected online.  Data from online and offline sources is typically merged for analytic purposes.  Our Privacy Policy may be viewed at 
http://sp01.netcrimson.com/extraneous/privacy/CRprivacy.htm
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
